issues.response: We are working on a redesign to improve navigation.
We've identified the issue and are implementing a fix to ensure all tiles are clickable.

issues.description: Thumbs Up/Down widget doesn't display on all browsers
issues.response: We're optimizing the widget's to support broader pool of browsers.
We are optimizing our backend and implementing caching to improve load times.
Export feature is planned for the next release.
We're enhancing our search algorithm to provide more accurate and relevant results.
We have identified the issue and a fix will be deployed this week.
